metadata.title: CVE-2017-7671 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: There is a DOS attack vulnerability in Apache Traffic Server (ATS) 5.2.0 to 5.3.2, 6.0.0 to 6.2.0, and 7.0.0 with the TLS handshake. This issue can cause the server to coredump.

criterions.comment: trafficserver package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.1.2+ds-2build1').
